definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 38:5 load, burden, lifting, bearing, tribute;—´[[מ]] abs. Ne 13:19 +; cstr. 2Ki 5:17 +; sf. [[מַשָּׂאוֹ]] Ex 23:5 + 2 t.; [[מַשַּׂאֲכֶם]] De 1:12; [[מַשָּׂאָם]] Nu 4:27 + 2 t.;—

load, burden of ass Ex 23:5 (E), mules 2Ki 5:17, camels 2Ki 8:9, cf. Is 46:1, Is 46:2; hanging on a peg Is 22:25 (fig.); forbidden on Sabbath Je 17:21, Je 17:22, Je 17:24, Je 17:27, Ne 13:15, Ne 13:19; fig. of people as burden Nu 11:11, Nu 11:17 (JE), De 1:12, cf. [[עַל־]] ´[[הָיָה לְמ]] 2Sa 15:33, 2Sa 19:36 ([[אֶל־]]), also [[וׇאֶהְיֶה עָלַי לְמַשָּׂא]] Job 7:20; of iniquities Ps 38:5.—Ho 8:10 rd. [[מְשׁׂחַ]], so LXX We Now GASm.
n. verb., lifting, uplifting, only [[נַפְשָׁם]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 24:25 the uplifting of their soul, i.e. that to which they lift up their soul, their heart's desire.

n. verb., bearing, carrying, Nu 4:24 (+ [[לַעֲבׂד]]), 2Ch 20:25, 2Ch 35:3 ([[בַּכָּתֵף]]), so prob. 1Ch 15:22, 1Ch 15:22, 1Ch 15:27 (cf. Be Kau; > singing, uplifting of voice, e.g. Öt); esp. of responsibility and duty of bearing sacred vessels (oft. ‖[[עֲבׂדָה]], [[פְּקֻדָּה]]) Nu 4:15, Nu 4:19, Nu 4:27, Nu 4:27, Nu 4:49, ´[[עֲבׂדַת מ]] v:Nu 4:47, ´[[מִשְׁמֶרֶת מ]] v:Nu 4:31; v:Nu 4:32.
perhaps what is carried, brought, i.e. tribute ´[[כֶּסֶף מ]] 2Ch 17:11 silver as tribute (+ [[מִנְחָה]]; cf. [[נשׂא]]
